resources.string: Alex invests 100/- on single number (for e.g. 2) and then it is the winning number, he will win 900/-
Alex invests 100/- on two numbers (for e.g. 2 & 3) and then either of them is the winning number, he will win 450/-
Alex invests 100/- on three numbers (for e.g. 1,2 & 3) and then either of them is the winning number, he will win 300/-
Alex invests 100/- on four numbers (for e.g. 0, 1, 2 & 3) and then either of them is the winning number, he will win 200/-
"You can place bet on the number between 2 to 6 or number 7 or between 8 to 12"
Player is free to place bet on any slot of his choice
"You just have to select number between 2 to 6 or number 7 or between 8 to 12 and click on roll dice "
" If you place a bet of 100/- on number between 2 to 6 and if the number comes between 2 to 6 then you win 200/- .which means your winning amount is doubled ."
"If you place a bet of 100/- on number between 8 to 12 and if the number comes between 8 to 12 then you win 200/- .which means your winning amount is doubled. "
If you place a bet of 100/- on number 7 and if the number comes exatact 7 then you win 300/- .which means your winning amount is tripled.

For Example \n 1) If you place a bet of 100/- on number 9 and the winning number in leaderboard comes number 9 then your winning amount is 90 times of 100/- ,which means your winning amount is 9000/-.
